name: The King of Summer (18+) (v 0.2.6)
description:
*Mac version can be downloaded at Patreon page for free.

SYNOPSIS

Satoshi and Mary are a college couple happily in love, ready for their first summer vacation together.

One day, Satoshi recieves an e-mail from his uncle Kendo, inviting him to spend several weeks with him at the Naval Treasure Resort, a luxurious summer resort, all costs paid.

Overjoyed, Satoshi and Mary head over there, ready to enjoy their vacation to the fullest.

And enjoy it they will... for Mary is a beautiful girl, Satoshi a well-meaning but negligent boy, and Kendo a man who thought his days as a manly womanizer were behind him...

...until Mary awakens something in him that will unleash his desire and lust in every young girl that catches his attention!

A tale of NTR full of seduction, forbidden relationships and (surprisingly) a happy end!

GAMEPLAY

As usual with Visual Novels, The King of Summer features a heavy amount of text and choices. There are no bad endings planned yet, and a gameplay loop will be implemented where you can choose where to go, whether to allow a character to hang out with Kendo and more! Press on choices and collect every scene available!
